summary: In the seaside town of Boulogne, no one seems to be able to cope with their past, least of all Hélène, an antique furniture saleswoman, her stepson Bernard, and her former lover Alphonse.
cast: Delphine Seyrig|Jean-Pierre Kérien|Nita Klein|Jean-Baptiste Thiérrée|Claude Sainval|Laurence Badie|Jean Champion|Jean Dasté|Martine Vatel|Julien Verdier|Philippe Laudenbach|Nelly Borgeaud|Catherine de Seynes|Gaston Joly|Gérard Lorin|Françoise Bertin|Wanda Kerien|Jean-Jacques Lagarde|Paul Chevalier|Laure Paillette|Robert Bordenave|Éliane Chevet|Yves Peneau|Yves Vincent
title: Muriel
